text: The A1 Team Russia is the defunct Russian team of A1 Grand Prix, an international racing series. ==Owners== A1 Team Russia owner was Svetlana Strelnikova. Race team was Russian Age Racing. ==Drivers== The drivers for the Russian team were Roman Rusinov, Alexey Vasilyev, and Mikhail Aleshin.
